page.title: 11Joseph Pighills (Artist)
page.content: { Mr Pighills,}who died two years ago,was well known in{Yorkshire}for his water colours of local scenes and in particular the moors surrounding {Haworth}and{Marsh}where he lived.He did not begin to paint until his retirement from the woollen mills and had no artistic training,but his paintings are now achieving the recognition they deserve.In his lifetime his pictures were sold privately or through the picture gallery at{Trawden.}Many were given to his friends and{Denis Healey M.P}is said to have some of them. He was married with one son,{John},who is carrying on the family's artistic tradition.
